name: Drillbur's 1st Adven-Churr
description:
My second solo project. A short and simple platformer game. You play as Drillbur; a young Star-nosed mole who's favorite hobby is Treasure-hunting (in more ways than one). He needs to find three keys to find the treasure in the other room. Warning: one key is cleverly hidden!

Music: "Shiny Depths" by Michael Robinson HomingStar
